name: Saskia: Commander

Immunity.

name: Feign Death
ability:

Chapter 1: Spawn 2 Elven Deadeyes on this row.
Chapter 2: Spawn and play Waylay.

name: Telianyn aep Collen
ability:
Deploy: Shuffle an allied unit with a provision cost of 10 or less into your deck, then play the top Elf with a Deploy ability from your deck.

name: Riordain
ability:

Elf - Play a Trap from your deck.

name: Simlas Finn aep Dabairr
ability: Deploy: Play all copies of a bronze special card from your deck.

name: Angus Bri Cri
ability:
Deploy: For the rest of the game, whenever an Elven Deadeye enters your side of the battlefield, boost it by 1.
If your starting deck has at least 4 unique Traps, this card starts in your hand.

name: The Great Oak
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by the number of cards to the left of Great Oak, then boost self by the number of cards to the right of Great Oak.

name: Iorveth
ability: Deploy: Move an allied Trap back to your hand, then play a Trap.

name: Vernossiel
ability:

name: Isengrim Faoiltiarna

name: Toruviel
ability:

Deploy (Ranged): Damage all units on an enemy row by 1.
If you control an Elven Deadeye, combine both abilities instead.

name: Aelirenn
ability: At the end of your turn, if you control 5 or more Elves, Summon self from your deck or graveyard to your Melee row.

name: Yaevinn
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1 for every other allied Elf unit.

name: Éibhear Hattori
ability: Play a Trap card from your graveyard.

name: Backup Plan
ability: Damage the last unit played by your opponent by 2 and Create a bronze Scoia'tael Elf with a Deploy ability that was not in your starting deck.

name: Hostage Taker
ability:
Deploy: Seize an enemy unit with 0 or less power, then transform the Seized unit into an Elven Deadeye without changing its power.
The maximum power is increased by 1 for each Trap you played this round.

name: Dol Blathanna Bowman
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Increase the value by 1 for each row that separates it from this unit.
